channel.title: (718) setting titles
channel.description: Hey guys, iv lately just been messing around with the rune-evo source and with some research i found out how to change player ranks, my concern now though is how do i assign titles to players name, the only way i can make admins and mods are to go to player.java and change it up in there . i cant veiw a .txt file to change up there rights or donator status. Thankx :)
